raw:
{{Infobox weapon poe2
| name              = Aamiina's Legacy
| icon              = poe2 hunting_bow_aamiinas-legacy_icon.png
| description       = Aamiina of the Blue Water tribe, daughter of the revered Ajamuut, carried on her mother’s duties after the death of the matron huntress. To secure her status as the successor of her foremother, Aamiina enrolled in the challenge of Ongitok Angunisaq. Far from a game, this trial pitted the young dwarf against all the dangers of Naasitaq. She spent three weeks in the wild, battling endless blizzards and voracious beasts. Her bow was her only means of defense and subsistence.

Her trial complete, Aamiina was trekking for home when she happened across a hungry frost drake stalking towards Blue Water village, using the storm to hide its approach. With no consideration for her own safety, Aamiina raised her horn and trumpeted a warning to the Blue Water warriors, who mobilized in time to fend off the beast.

Denied its prize, the fearsome drake turned on Aamiina. The young huntress nocked and loosed, slaying the drake with a single arrow to the heart. Her bold actions secured her place among the matron huntresses that came before her.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Weapon
| weapon_type       = Hunting bow
| requirements      = 
| is_soulbound      = no
| is_unique         = yes
| value             = 2264
| shop_value        = 11320

| recovery_time     = 4.0
| penetration       = 8
